name: Axel's Advanced Mathematic Class
description:
DISCLAIMER:
This Baldi's Basics mod wasn't inspired by anything, since I didn't have a source of inspiration, since this mod is just a mod- It doesn't always need a source of inspiration. Now, without further adu, lets go do the actual description.

CREDITS ARE INGAME!

Yay, the Itch.io release.

STORY(SPOILERS!):
Oh noes! Your stupid, dumb ass friend left all his 7 pencils at school! He has to do therapy after school for thirty minutes, because he saw a woman get splatted by a train when he was 6 years old! You, as his friend must collect his pencils at Axel's school and return the pencils to your friend! Be carefull, Axel doesn't like incorrect answers, so don't get a question wrong, and try to exit so you can return those colorfull pencils to your stupid, dumb ass friend.

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/AAMC/490420

Gamebanana: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/11419
